summary: Adds yet another comfortable little player home to Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first go at any sort of modding so it is very basic but i did my best, i still have a lot to learn and get right so tips and advice are welcomed.

[u][b]Version 1.4[/b][/u]
- Interior revamp (house only)
- Adds a display case

[u][b]Version 1.3 Updates:[/b][/u]
- Cleared up Clutter for a spacier home.
- Plaque & Weapon rack issues fixed.
- Book Shelf fixed.
- Hanaging moss added to basement. (thanks FalmerBane, for the idea.) Harvest them if you dont like them :)
- Changed grindstone and weapon rack in basement (positions)
- Moved basement to same worldspace as house.
- Navmeshes redone.



[b][u]Riverhome Features :[/u][/b]

[u][b]Outside:[/b][/u]

Anvil
Tanning Rack
Weapon Rack (3 spaces)
Workbench

[u][b]Inside:[/b][/u]

Bookshelf
Bed
Cooking Pot
Shield Plaque
Storage Chest
Weapon Plaque x2

[u][b]Basement:[/b][/u]

Alchemy Lab
Grindstone
Weapon Rack (5 spaces)
Storage Unit (3 chests)
Enchanting Room
author: xooki3
